SourcedStatement: That the highest elected leaders should conduct themselves like they did when they were children on the playground, it speaks poorly of their appreciation for the responsibility of the role that they have.
Name: Kamala Harris
Title: Vice President of the United States
Justification: Harris explained that a name is a precious gift from one’s family, rooted in tradition, love, and hope.

SourcedStatement: I don’t pay attention to the name-calling, Trevor. There’s some of us who have lived a lifetime of being called names. It is predictable, it is childish, and it will not distract me.
Name: Kamala Harris
Title: Vice President of the United States
Justification: Harris added, addressing the topic this way, Harris highlighted her commitment to dignity and respect, even in the face of those who choose to behave otherwise.
